overview: The story of "Payne & Redemption" surrounds the psychological trauma endured by the film's main character, a weathered New York Detective, and his journey to seek redemption, after having to deal with a long line of traumatic incidents that have occurred in his recent life.
tagline: No Cop. A Full Clip. And A Whole Lotta Painkillers.
title: Payne & Redemption
